chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Y: Set
X: Set
icomp: (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y
ilen: X -> nat
Hilen: forall (lnk : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (icomp lnk n x) = ilen x
state_Y: Type
state_X: Type
step_X: X -> nat * state_X -> nat * state_X -> Prop
step_Y: Y -> nat * state_Y -> nat * state_Y -> Prop
step_X_tot: forall (I : X) (st1 : nat * state_X), exists st2 : nat * state_X, I /X/ st1 -1> st2
step_Y_fun: forall (I : Y) (st st1 st2 : nat * state_Y), I /Y/ st -1> st1 -> I /Y/ st -1> st2 -> st1 = st2
simul: state_X -> state_Y -> Prop
Hicomp: instruction_compiler_sound
P: (nat * list X)%type
iQ: nat
iP: nat
cP: list X
err: nat

Goal:
P = (iP, cP)

Premises:
Notation lnk := gen_linker

length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat

VarMap.Branch : VarMap.t ?A -> ?A -> VarMap.t ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [X : Set Y : Set icomp : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y ilen : X -> nat Hilen : forall (lnk : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (icomp lnk n x) = ilen x state_X : Type state_Y : Type step_X : X -> nat * state_X -> nat * state_X -> Prop step_Y : Y -> nat * state_Y -> nat * state_Y ->...-> Prop Hicomp : instruction_compiler_sound P : nat * list X iQ : nat iP := fst P : nat cP := snd P : list X err := iQ + length_compiler ilen cP : nat |- Type]
compiler_complete_step : forall (linker : nat -> nat) (P : nat * list X) (Q : nat * list Y), (forall (i : nat) (I : X), (i, I :: nil) <sc P -> (linker i, icomp linker i I) <sc Q /\ linker (1 + i) = ilen I + linker i) -> forall (p : nat) (st1 : nat * state_X) (w1 w3 : nat * state_Y), snd st1 ⋈ snd w1 -> linker (fst st1) = fst w1 -> in_code (fst st1) P -> out_code (fst w3) Q -> Q /Y/ w1 -[ p ] -> w3 -> exists (q : nat) (st2 : nat * state_X) (w2 : nat * state_Y), snd st2 ⋈ snd w2 /\ linker (fst st2) = fst w2 /\ P /X/ st1 -> > st2 /\ Q /Y/ w2 -[ q ] -> w3 /\ q < p
compiler_complete' : forall (linker : nat -> nat) (P : nat * list X) (Q : nat * list Y), (forall (i : nat) (I : X), (i, I :: nil) <sc P -> (linker i, icomp linker i I) <sc Q /\ linker (1 + i) = ilen I + linker i) -> forall (i1 : nat) (v1 : state_X) (w1 : state_Y) (st : nat * state_Y), v1 ⋈ w1 /\ Q /Y/ (linker i1, w1) ~~> st -> exists (i2 : nat) (v2 : state_X) (w2 : state_Y), v2 ⋈ w2 /\ P /X/ (i1, v1) ~~> (i2, v2) /\ Q /Y/ (linker i2, w2) ~~> st
sss_steps_ind : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (P0 : nat -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall st : nat * data, P0 0 st st) -> (forall (n : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), sss_step one_step P st1 st2 -> sss_steps one_step P n st2 st3 -> P0 n st2 st3 -> P0 (S n) st1 st3) -> forall (n : nat) (p p0 : nat * data), sss_steps one_step P n p p0 -> P0 n p p0
compiler_length : forall (X Y : Type) (c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y) (lc : X -> nat), (forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x) -> forall (P : nat * list X) (i err : nat), length (compiler c lc P i err) = length_compiler lc (snd P)
compiler_complete : forall (linker : nat -> nat) (P : nat * list X) (Q : nat * list Y), (forall (i : nat) (I : X), (i, I :: nil) <sc P -> (linker i, icomp linker i I) <sc Q /\ linker (1 + i) = ilen I + linker i) -> forall (i1 : nat) (v1 : state_X) (w1 : state_Y), v1 ⋈ w1 -> Q /Y/ (linker i1, w1) ↓ -> P /X/ (i1, v1) ↓
subcode_sss_compute_linstr : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (k : nat) (li : list instr) (P : nat * list instr) (st1 st2 st : nat * data), sss_steps one_step (fst st1, li) k st1 st2 -> (fst st1, li) <sc P -> sss_compute one_step P st2 st -> sss_compute one_step P st1 st
linker_in_code : forall (X Y : Type) (c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y) (lc : X -> nat), (forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x) -> forall (P : nat * list X) (i err : nat), (forall x : X, 1 <= lc x) -> forall j : nat, in_code j P -> in_code (linker lc P i err j) (i, compiler c lc P i err)
Inductive sss_steps (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) : nat -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop := in_sss_steps_0 : forall st : nat * data, sss_steps one_step P 0 st st | in_sss_steps_S : forall (n : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), sss_step one_step P st1 st2 -> sss_steps one_step P n st2 st3 -> sss_steps one_step P (S n) st1 st3 Arguments sss_steps [instr data]%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%nat_scope Arguments in_sss_steps_0 [instr data]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments in_sss_steps_S [instr data]%type_scope [one_step]%function_scope [P] [n]%nat_scope [st1 st2 st3]
comp_length : forall (X Y : Type) (c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y) (lc : X -> nat), (forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x) -> forall (lnk : nat -> nat) (i : nat) (ll : list X) (j : nat), length (comp c lc lnk i ll j) = length_compiler lc ll
linker_out_code : forall (X Y : Type) (c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y) (lc : X -> nat), (forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x) -> forall (P : nat * list X) (i err j : nat), err < i \/ length_compiler lc (snd P) + i <= err -> out_code j P -> out_code (linker lc P i err j) (i, compiler c lc P i err)
subcode_sss_steps_stop : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (i : instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 : nat * data), (forall st : nat * data, ~ one_step i st1 st) -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> sss_steps one_step P k st1 st2 -> k = 0 /\ st1 = st2
in_sss_steps_S : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (n : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), sss_step one_step P st1 st2 -> sss_steps one_step P n st2 st3 -> sss_steps one_step P (S n) st1 st3
compiler_sound : forall (linker : nat -> nat) (P : nat * list X) (Q : nat * list Y), (forall (i : nat) (I : X), (i, I :: nil) <sc P -> (linker i, icomp linker i I) <sc Q /\ linker (1 + i) = ilen I + linker i) -> forall (i1 : nat) (v1 : state_X) (i2 : nat) (v2 : state_X) (w1 : state_Y), v1 ⋈ w1 /\ P /X/ (i1, v1) -> > (i2, v2) -> exists w2 : state_Y, v2 ⋈ w2 /\ Q /Y/ (linker i1, w1) -> > (linker i2, w2)
in_sss_step : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (k : nat) (l : list instr) (i : instr) (r : list instr) (st1 st2 : nat * data), fst st1 = k + length l -> one_step i st1 st2 -> sss_step one_step (k, l ++ i :: r) st1 st2
compiler_subcode : forall (X Y : Type) (c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y) (lc : X -> nat), (forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x) -> forall (P : nat * list X) (i err j : nat) (x : X), (j, x :: nil) <sc P -> (linker lc P i err j, c (linker lc P i err) j x) <sc (i, compiler c lc P i err) /\ linker lc P i err (1 + j) = lc x + linker lc P i err j
link : forall X : Type, (X -> nat) -> nat -> list X -> nat -> list (nat * nat)
compiler : forall X Y : Type, ((nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y) -> (X -> nat) -> nat * list X -> nat -> nat -> list Y
sss_steps_0_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (st1 st2 : nat * data), sss_steps one_step P 0 st1 st2 -> st1 = st2
